# summing subsets - resno5.py

ans=[0]*23
#f = []

for k in range(1,23):
    fk = (k*(k+1)/2 * 2**(k-1) ) % 8388608
    #f.append(fk)
    ans[k] = (ans[k-1] + fk) % 8388608  # answer is sum of fk's

# 8388608 = 2^23,  so f[23] = 23*24/2 * 2^22 %23 =0, and
#          all higher k's have factor of 2^23 or more

# sum(f[n]) 1..k = sum(f[n])1..23 for k>

t = int(raw_input())

for iter in range(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n>22:
        n=22
    print ans[n]
